event_full-description: New edition of IntercambiART - Art Market Exchange in Barcelona IntercambiArt is aimed at artists, art collectors interested in buying art directly from the artists without intermediaries, and sponsors linked to art. A NauArt INTERCAMBIART we thought it is a good philosophy to apply to the sector before the current difficulty of artists to promote and sell art. The mission is to provide patronage and art exchange between members and the general public for contemporary art with artists to promote, facilitate access to useful services and other works of artists from different fields through the exchange. Each artist can participate with a maximum of 3 works. Registration is through a contribution of 10 € for those who get the first 10 points to open your account and IntercambiART exchange standards. More information: intercambiart@gmail.com With the collaboration of: MORITZ + info

event_title1: Exhibition of projects of the Master in Research and Experimentation
event_full-description: On June 30 at 18:30 pm will be held at HANGAR the closing event of the MASTER IN RESEARCH AND EXPERIMENTAL DESIGN 2015-16, consisting of: * Overview of the Master program 2016/17 * Presentations projects students: Ane Beraza, Joana Capella, Claudia Grana, Aina Guirao, Carlos Medrano, Ignacio and Maria Virshych New Music with Dj Josianito * free admission and all LA invitadxs! Information about the master here: http://bit.ly/1OB9vOA Image: Aina project Guirao + info

The Photographic Social Vision Foundation enjoins the public to enjoy the exhibitions of documentary and photojournalistic photography DOCfield> 16 Festival to be held in Barcelona from 19 May to 19 July under the theme Europe: Lost in Translation a proposal from the artistic director Natasha Christia, curator, writer and Greek teacher specializing in contemporary manifestations of photography and its intersection with other genres. For her the choice of the theme of this year "is a very conscious decision that responds to the urgent need to talk about us, look back to the old continent and to question its ideological essence and identity in these turbulent times. The refugee crisis, financial scandals, nationalism and the rise of positions of the extreme right, the disparities between the center and borders, xenophobia, Europe , North and South, are issues that help us to reveal what was European Union and dream and opening the debate to reflect on the model of coexistence we want to build. " + info

Art Nou / First Visió highlights the role of galleries in the search and identification of new artistic values, breaking down the barriers separating young artists to the public. We leave the space of the galleries to create synergies with other artistic agents of the city. During July, Barcelona becomes the epicenter of young art, with exhibitions and activities in galleries, museums, foundations and art centers, which serve to reflect on contemporary creation. + Info

! * Market Summer Whisper Barcelona ♥ third edition ♥ On 10 July are to travel with family and friends the market in Barrio de Gracia, a place where you can find unique products, handicraft manufacturing at super affordable prices: paintings, design objects, crafts. Live music, bar with homemade food and drinks at affordable price! We will wait for you!! Address: QUEVEDO 29, Barrio de Gracia Time (JOANIC meter): From 19h to 22 hr. Are you an artist and want to participate in the Fair? Sumate! Email us at susurro.barcelona@gmail.com telling us how you would like to participate. Only original articles may be sold first hand and reasonable prices. Do not be late! The first choose your space! ;) + Info

Gyuk artist, originally from Barcelona, ​​pen draws. He is an illustrator and you will see an exhibition of works, which run the full range of his inner vision, so deep that it seems unreal compared to the reality that surrounds us. From the flowers to the human figures, everything fits. No apparent relationship to each other, because we do not know where fit; a place without rules where each piece tells its own story and trace its own path. "Unboxed" is defined as a crop of concepts introspective moments, creatures and characters. Could they be excluded from a formal reality? come see. The gallery walls are transformed by Moraima their creations. + Info
